revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 68:;Petaus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petaus, mother Tkateis, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Pnepheros, son of Esouris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Papeis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, obols 28;;Sambous, daughter of Onnophris (through the agency of Chairemon, son of Apitas;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 21 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 3 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharge drachmas 5 obols 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 48 obols 3) eparourion drachmas 14 obol 1, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 47 obols 5;;Sambas, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 84.;(Pachon) 28 likewise:;Herakleides, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Ptolemais, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Maron, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Phasis, grandson of Keras, mother Helene, drachmas 4;;Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Petesouchos alias Pnepheros, grandson of Sokrates, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 16;;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Thases, drachmas 4 copper obols 28.;(Pachon) 29 likewise:;Sarapias, daughter of Ptolemaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225);;(in left margin: drachmas 192 obols 8) orchard taxes apomoira drachmas 34 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 4 obols 5.5, naubion drachmas 3 obols 4 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 8 obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 22 obols 5.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 5.5, kollybos drachma 1 obols 2, in total drachmas 77 obols 5.5;;orchard taxes on those in valuation for the 12th year;;apomoira drachmas 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 4.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 3 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obol 1;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 86, surcharges drachmas 5 obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 91 obols 2 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 8 obols 3, surcharges obols 5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 9 obols 3 chalki 2;;tax on land plots in release likewise drachmas 2 obol 0.5, surcharges obols 2.5 kollybos obols 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;and to Gaius Valerius Martialis;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 3 chalki 2;;12th year likewise drachma 1 obols 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 3 chalki 2;;Thaseis, daughter of Petheus (Mysthes, son of Xistis);;(in left margin: drachmas 56 obols 6) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 25, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 3 obols 3 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges drachmas 6 obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 16 obols 4, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obols 5.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
